mainBoard.name: Teshar, Ancestor's Apostle
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever you cast a historic spell, return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

rulings.text: A card, spell, or permanent is historic if it has the legendary supertype, the artifact card type, or the Saga subtype. Having two of those qualities doesn't make an object more historic than another or provide an additional bonus—an object either is historic or it isn't.
An ability that triggers “whenever you cast a historic spell” doesn't trigger if a historic card is put onto the battlefield without being cast.
If the mana cost of a card in your graveyard includes {X}, X is considered to be 0.

Lands are never cast, so abilities that trigger “whenever you cast a historic spell” won't trigger if you play a legendary land. They also won't trigger if a card on the battlefield transforms into a legendary land, as the Ixalan and Rivals of Ixalan double-faced cards do.
Some abilities trigger “whenever you cast a historic spell.” Such an ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

mainBoard.name: Nezahal, Primal Tide
mainBoard.originalText:
Nezahal, Primal Tide can't be countered.
You have no maximum hand size.
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, draw a card.
Discard three cards: Exile Nezahal. Return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: After Nezahal returns to the battlefield, it will be a new object with no connection to the creature that was exiled. It won't be in combat or have any additional abilities it may have had when it was exiled. Any +1/+1 counters on it or Auras attached to it are removed, and any Equipment will no longer be attached.
Nezahal's triggered ability resolves before the noncreature spell that caused it to trigger.

Players can cast spells and activate abilities after Nezahal's triggered ability resolves but before the spell that caused it to trigger does. Notably, the card you draw may be able to counter that spell or may be discarded to activate Nezahal's last ability.

Your maximum hand size is checked only during the cleanup step on your turn. If Nezahal's last ability is activated before your turn's end step, it will return before your next cleanup step and you'll have no maximum hand size.

"Quando implantei em mim mesmo a Ponte Planar, senti minha centelha de planeswalker arder para além do meu corpo. O Multiverso era o meu brinquedo. A sensação foi... inacreditável."
— Tezzeret
foreignData.name: Uno com a Máquina
foreignData.text: Compre uma quantidade de cards igual ao maior custo de mana convertido dentre os dos artefatos que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Когда я встроил в себя Межмировой Мост, я почувствовал, как искра Planeswalker-а разгорается все ярче и ярче. Вся Мультивселенная стала моей игрушкой. Это было... невероятно».
— Теззерет
foreignData.name: Единство с Машиной
foreignData.text: Возьмите количество карт, равное наибольшему значению конвертированной мана-стоимости среди артефактов под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText:
「在我把时空渡桥拼接到身上时，我感到自己的鹏洛客火花闪耀全身。整个多重宇宙都是我的玩物。这感觉. . .无与伦比。」
～泰兹瑞

「在我把時空渡橋拼接到身上時，我感到自己的鵬洛客火花閃耀全身。整個多重宇宙都是我的玩物。這感覺. . .無與倫比。」
～泰茲瑞

mainBoard.flavorText: Ships blown north in their voyage across the Stormwreck Sea become trapped in the unmelting ice.

Die Gletscherfestung kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst eine Ebene oder eine Insel.
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {W} oder {U}.

foreignData.text:
La Forteresse glaciaire arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez une plaine ou une île.

あなたが平地か島をコントロールしていないかぎり、氷河の城砦はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{W}か{U}を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: 폭풍난파 바다를 건너다가 북쪽으로 밀려간 배들은 영원히 녹지 않는 얼음에 갇힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: Корабли, которых относит на север во время перехода через море Гибельных Бурь, оказываются скованы никогда не тающими льдами.

mainBoard.name: Glacial Fortress
mainBoard.originalText:
Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

rulings.text: As this is entering, it checks for lands that are already on the battlefield. It won't see lands that are entering at the same time (due to Warp World, for example).

This checks for lands you control with the land type Plains or Island, not for lands named Plains or Island. The lands it checks for don't have to be basic lands. For example, if you control Watery Grave (a nonbasic land with the land types Island and Swamp), Glacial Fortress will enter untapped.

mainBoard.text:
Glacial Fortress enters tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

mainBoard.flavorText: The river split into many channels as it flowed to the Halimar Sea. Few travelers could follow the same one twice.

foreignData.text:
Der Mäanderstrom kommt getappt ins Spiel.

foreignData.text:
El Río serpenteante entra al campo de batalla girado.
{T}: Agrega {W} o {U}.
